[**City Ward Map**](https://tinyurl.com/Beeville-Ward-Map)**- Locate your ward here to report your issue.**

**\*\*Attention 311 Users:\*\***

If you are reporting a \*\*life-threatening emergency\*\*, please \*\*call 911 immediately\*\*.  For \*\*non-emergency police matters\*\* that require immediate attention, please call **\*\*361-358-8100\*\*** to speak with a live police dispatcher.  Using this number ensures that your concern is addressed as quickly and efficiently as possible. Thank you for your cooperation!
